items.title: Open Epic: How to set Launch Options
Open Windows: Graphics Settings (set Fortnite to High performance)
Disable Remote Desktop Device Redirector Bus
Open NVIDIA App / GeForce Experience overlays info

Open NVIDIA App / GeForce Experience overlays info
Open Epic: How to set Launch Options
Disable Remote Desktop Device Redirector Bus
Open Default Graphics Settings (HAGS / windowed optimizations)
Open Advanced App Settings (Archive apps toggle)
